title: UAT Lead (SAP Testing) - Hyderabad
summary: Our team is looking for a UAT Lead to join our Business Process Re-engineering (BPR) group who would help define and drive the QA vision for end-to-end functional testing for key platforms and applications.
description: As UAT Lead, we look forward to your contributions in these areas: Communication and coordination with globally distributed teams, Work closely with internal organizations, project teams and stakeholders to develop project schedules, implement test plans and cases, and deliver high quality products, Enhance Quality Assurance processes, environments, tools and frameworks, Act as a strong advocate for quality in the product development process for software engineering, Champion Apple’s dedication to providing extraordinary user experience and drives the team to work towards this shared goal, Uphold Apple’s ethical and moral standards while working with internal and external partners, Form the team on the foundation of excellence, professional growth, inclusivity and respect, Communicate effectively with peers, senior leadership and globally dispersed partners.
preferred_qualifications: 5-12 years experience in SAP Testing with good understanding of Supply Chain Processes. Experience in SD processes / Order to cash is good to have., Experience in testing/test management of S/4 Hana Implementations., Experience in product quality and uncovering hard to find scenarios and bugs., Background Managing vendor teams, Experience in QA for highly scalable, distributed and high performance platforms, Experience in functional testing, Excellent knowledge of QA automation methodologies, processes, and tools, Experience in developing test plans, test cases and performing testing, Familiar with one of the technologies like Worksoft, Tosca, Java, Python, SQL, Scala, Databases, NoSQL, Web Services (Rest & soap), Extremely detail oriented, committed to the highest quality of work you're doing, Experience in presenting executive level briefs for business reviews, forecast delivery schedules and risk mitigations, Deep Inquisitive mind and ability to bring in change.
education_experience: Bachelor’s / Masters degree in Computer Science / Software Engineering from a premier school
